text: Can someone help me add a custom workflow to update CRM records in a public app for a marketplace release?
Hey, I am looking to publish the app in the Integrated App section in workflows. Does someone know, how I can get my app in here?

Hi Ankit, this relies on an existing installed public app with a defined custom workflow action. This guide explains more about the process for creating one, but this all done via the API using the developer portal and API key <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions>
